presets.name: Training signup core
presets.description: Conversion-focused FAQ starter for training cohorts and workshops.

items.question: Do I need prior AI experience to join?

blocks.text: No prior AI experience is required. This training is designed for beginners and is still useful for experienced participants who want a more reliable workflow.

items.question: What do I need before the workshop starts?

blocks.text: You will need a paid account with at least one major AI platform before the first session. Please also bring a laptop, stable internet, and any internal examples you want to use during hands-on exercises.

items.question: How is the workshop delivered, and what if I miss a session?

blocks.text: Cohorts are delivered live using Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, or another proven collaboration platform. If you miss a session, contact us and we will share the best available catch-up option.

items.question: What will I get by the end (certificate, exercises, and take-home work)?

blocks.text: You will complete hands-on exercises and leave with practical take-home materials. Certificate availability may vary by program or event and is listed in the event details.
Yes. Every participant receives at least one hour of free consultation after the training, plus any additional support listed for that specific program or event.

items.question: How can I ask questions before enrolling, and what if I canâ€™t make this cohort?

blocks.text: If you have questions before enrolling, reach out any time. If this cohort timing does not work, we can share upcoming options.

items.question: ðŸ“§ Do you have a manager budget-approval letter I can send?

blocks.text: Yes. Use the email template below, open it in your email client, or copy it with one click.

blocks.subject: Request for approval: AI training program
blocks.body:
Hi [Manager Name],

I would like approval to attend [Program Name] with Cambermast.

This training is focused on practical, responsible AI use and includes
hands-on exercises I can apply directly in my role. I expect this will
help me improve speed and quality in [team/process area], while following
our policies and quality standards.

Program: [Program Name]
Dates: [Dates]
Cost: [Cost]
Link: [Program/Event URL]

After the training, I will share key takeaways and specific ways we can
apply what I learned to our team.

Thank you for considering this request.

Best,
[Your Name]

presets.name: Event signup core
presets.description: Conversion-focused FAQ starter for non-training events such as webinars and talks.

blocks.text: This event is designed for practical professionals who want actionable insights they can apply quickly.

items.question: How is the event delivered, and how do I join?

blocks.text: The event is delivered live online using Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, or a similar proven platform. Joining details are shared after registration.

items.question: Will a recording or follow-up materials be available?

blocks.text: Recording and resource availability depends on the event format and partner agreements. Check the event details or contact us for specifics.

items.question: How can I ask questions before registering, and what if I canâ€™t attend this date?

blocks.text: If you have questions before registering, reach out any time. If this date does not work, we can share upcoming options.
